learnings.summary: Methodology: We’ll break it down into a few steps: maybe setting up a simple licensing approach, thinking about h
learnings.details: We’ll break it down into a few steps: maybe setting up a simple licensing approach, thinking about how you want to deliver it—like a Google Workspace Marketplace add-on or just a downloadable template—and how to communicate its value. I’ll include a few options for how you could package it—like a simple licensing model or a distribution method—and we’ll make sure it all fits with your business style. So let’s approach it this way: we’ll think of the App Script as more of a component inside your consultancy offering rather than a standalone product
